channel.title: Dementhium 639 Client or Cache problem?
channel.description: I've done some recent additions lately(: To the Quantum source made summoning npcs spawnable and some other little things. one problem I've found. I jarred the client and sent it to my players when I hosted it on my localhost. everyone was having a good time. put it on my vps and now players can't do anything like the icons and chatbox are fucked. They can't do anything once they are logged in accept for basically walking around and talking to NPCs. they cant even open the shops/: the interface where the tabs are is lit up with yellow boxs and the chatbox is black for them. I didn't have this problem until I put it on the VPS. can the releaser or anyone help me?/:

item.title: Dementhium 639 Client or Cache problem?
item.dc:creator: @1800getk0ed 1800getk0ed
item.description:
@1800getk0ed wrote:

I’ve done some recent additions lately(: To the Quantum source made summoning npcs spawnable and some other little things. one problem I’ve found. I jarred the client and sent it to my players when I hosted it on my localhost. everyone was having a good time. put it on my vps and now players can’t do anything like the icons and chatbox are fucked. They can’t do anything once they are logged in accept for basically walking around and talking to NPCs. they cant even open the shops/: the interface where the tabs are is lit up with yellow boxs and the chatbox is black for them. I didn’t have this problem until I put it on the VPS. can the releaser or anyone help me?/:
